Question
========

A closed box contains five balls: three red and two yellow. You pick two balls at the same time at random. Suppose the random variable *X* is the number of red balls and *X* can take the values 0,1 and 2. What then is the expectation value of *X*?

Solution
========

The correct answer is: 1.2
